title: Please help i cant launch game how to fix it??
body:
So i have been playing league for 1 year and then suddenly today 13.4.2017. league said that there is some possible corruption data and that it should be fixed.Then my screen freeze(i think has nothing to do with lol) and i just shut down my laptop with button.
After i turn on my laptop league of legends shortcut icon was the old client icon and i had the new one.Then it said i cant open it because that file is maybe deleted or moved.I deinstalled lol and installed it again.I click on shortcut.I donwload patch and then i click launch button.The client dissapears and nothing happens i w8 and w8 still nothing.Then i try it again and again just nothing happens.PLEASE can someone help me ;(.

replies.body: This is a strange case, did you do a system restore at anytime during this period?  I suggest doing a completely clean state by performing a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).  This should help resolve both corrupted files as well as any directory issues locating the client.  Let me know if that works out for you!
Hi was recetnly banned for third party use can u plz look into it as i have never used anything other than curse plz i want to play so badly
